org.apache.giraph.edge

接口 ReusableEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index
    E - Edge value
    所有超级接口:
    Edge<I,E>, MutableEdge<I,E>
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultEdge, EdgeNoValue

    public interface ReusableEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends MutableEdge<I,E>
    A complete edge, the target vertex and the edge value. Can only be one edge with a destination vertex id per edge map. This edge can be reused, that is you can set it's target vertex ID and edge value. Note: this class is useful for certain optimizations, but it's not meant to be exposed to the user. Look at MutableEdge instead.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setTargetVertexId(I targetVertexId)
      Set the destination vertex index of this edge.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.edge.Edge
